column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/7e08e29117546aae66b0b418b2044f77b70b312f for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
@sipa Mind merging this one, it's similar to the change in txdb.cpp a few days ago.\n
ACK, though I prefer being consistent, and using "error...: message" rather than "error - message".\n
I'm not sure I understand your comment, this is from txdb.cpp and seems rather similar (better identical): `error("%s : Deserialize or I/O error - %s", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, e.what());`.\n
Apologies, I didn't check and misremembered. ACK.\n
